data.message: Great idea of addressing this issue of acknowledging and being kind to all those around us ,especially those that are in the jobs of service. A simple thank you and a smile shows appreciation and kindness and brightens everyone's day. Love thy neighbor.😀❤️👍👏

replies.message: Thanks for the support, Paula! We appreciate you sharing and being part of the community. -Tenaya
That looks so good the food that you cook it makes me hungry the best of luck with your restaurant if I was close I would not mind stopping their to eat

Great to appreciate those that help make us comfortable on a daily basis. People who we seldom notice and wouldn't miss unless we realize they are gone. We suddenly  see the trash cans running over, sewage lines overflowing,nothing to eat in the fridge, no one to cook, daycare closed, schools closed, cleaners closed, phone lines down, car won't start.we suddenly realize the world we live in need us to all be apart of the puzzle. Thank you for noticing the unsung heroes.
